full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Project Title

**Eng:** One Senior HR Consultant and One Intermediate HR Consultant

**Fran:** Un expert-conseil en ressources humaines Principal et un expert-conseil en ressources humaines Intermédiaire

### Reference Number

*MUST13419*

### Tender Details

* **Publicación Date:** May 15, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 7, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2025
* **Contract Duration:** 3 years, with possible 3 additional 1-year options
* **Estimated Level of Effort:** 190 days

### Notice Type

* **Short-Termsheet:** RFP against Supply Arrangement

### Description

* The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada seeks the services of a contractor to provide senior and intermediate HR consultants to assist with HR capacity needs.
* The consultants will support the Chief Digital Officer Sector with their HR capacity requirements.
* Closing date: 30 May, 2024.

### Attention to Potential Suppliers

Please consult the attached document for full details and conditions for this project. The Request for Proposal document includes details on how to become a qualified SA holder, if you are not already one.

To verify the transcript, please have a look at the [ Point of Contact's ] email. Please note also the TSPS methodology is regularly updated.

Procurement Category is *SRV*. The project website is [ procurementwebsite ].
For all your comments and feedback : contact : Address.

---

### Reference
The above information is extracted from Tender CB-00377528 (Rev-01012108), disclosed to the public in Canada-wide tender notice RFP-22-001120.
### Name of Contracting Authority
Simon Cousineau. The Solicitation Number is 30005410. We have also consulted MPo-CCR Agreement, and the guards rights will take precedence.

---

### Languages: English & French

(c)i.saylor@parl.gc.ca
